```{r data, include=FALSE}
nhanes_ins = 
  nhanes %>% 
  pivot_longer(
    cols = hiq011:hiq260,
    names_to = "insurance_type",
    values_to = "insurance_value") %>% 
  select(seqn, insurance_type, insurance_value)

```
